entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming south 20 before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
